body_content.explanation: An uppish person thinks they are better than other people:
examples: I left my job because the work was boring and the people were kind of uppish.
The film version of Mary Poppins barely resembles the uppish creature originally dreamed up by PL Travers.

body_content.explanation: In sports such as cricket, an uppish ball is hit in an upward direction:
examples: The captain was eventually caught out with a sharp uppish cut to Gary Keedy.
The uppish shot that led to their 29th-minute goal might have been penalized by some referees.
